title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An epic open-world RPG where you play as Geralt, a monster hunter for hire.

title: Hollow Knight
description: A beautifully hand-drawn metroidvania set in a mysterious underground kingdom.

title: Celeste
description: A challenging platformer about climbing a mountain and facing your inner demons.

title: Stardew Valley
description: A relaxing farming simulator where you grow crops, raise animals, and build relationships.
